title: Wind Cave National Park: Post Ranger Guided Visit Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Ranger Guided     Post Ranger Guided Visit Materials                  Post Visit Materials      The Connections program introduces specific ecological concepts.  Using post-visit activities teachers can reinforce the concept that the students learned while visiting the park.  The webpages below provide post-visit activities for your field trip:First grade          Similarities and DifferencesSecond grade      Homes and HabitatThird grade       Adaptation in NatureFourth grade       Order in NatureFifth grade       Continuity and ChangeSixth grade        Interaction and InterdependenceSeventh/Eighth   Limiting FactorsHigh School      Water in the Environment
